results.content: This course is quite comprehensive compared with other courses available. Also, it's packed full with other stuffs like extensions and plugins. It really helped me to be a better developer. the instructor explained everything very clearly. If you're looking to learn bootstrap 5 and other stuffs that will make you a professional web developer, you should try it out.
